segments.text: What are the requirements to apply for the position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think my educational background suits this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I â€™ m quite satisfied with your qualifications .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does this job require that new employees take any kind of training course ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Generally speaking , training new members is usually necessary . We offer our new employees a one-week training course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell something about the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . You will be responsible for the designing and developing new products and also be in charge of the evaluation of the software programs including complex software systems to ensure product features and operation complaints .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . I believe I can do the job well .
segments.speaker: S1
